name: Fluffal Skunch
text:
You can return a face-up "Edge Imp" or "Fluffal" monster you control to your hand; Special Summon this card (From your hand). You can discard 1 "Edge Imp" or "Fluffal" monster, then apply the following effect based on the monster discarded;
● "Edge Imp" Monster: Add 1 "Fluffal" monster from your Deck to your hand. 
U+25CF "Fluffal" Monster: Add 1 "Edge Imp" monster from your Deck to your hand.
 You can only activate each effect of "Fluffal Skunch" once per turn.
